lines.i: Information on whether the infant or fetus suffered from one or more of a list of known malformations diagnosed prenatally or after delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.19"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:271)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:274)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:272)/@code="73780-9" Congenital anomalies of the newborn (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the nature of the congenital anomaly about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:275), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Newborn Congenital Anomalies 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7122 STATIC December 1, 2013

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Down confirmation information is relevant if Down syndrome has been chosen as a congenital anomaly.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="73779-1" Down syndrome karyotype status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Karyotype Down Syndrome 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7116 STATIC December 1, 2013

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Chromosomal disorder confirmation information is relevant if chromosomal disorder syndrome has been chosen as a congenital anomaly.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="73778-3" Suspected chromosomal disorder karyotype status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Karyotype Suspected Chromosomal Disorder 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7115 STATIC December 1, 2013
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:271)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:274)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:272)/@code="73780-9" Congenital anomalies of the newborn (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the nature of the congenital anomaly about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:275), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Newborn Congenital Anomalies 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7122 STATIC December 1, 2013

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Down confirmation information is relevant if Down syndrome has been chosen as a congenital anomaly.

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="73779-1" Down syndrome karyotype status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Karyotype Down Syndrome 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7116 STATIC December 1, 2013

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Chromosomal disorder confirmation information is relevant if chromosomal disorder syndrome has been chosen as a congenital anomaly.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="73778-3" Suspected chromosomal disorder karyotype status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1853226233"/> <code code="1202736350"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="381070891"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="73779-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Down syndrome karyotype status"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1211407002"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="73778-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Suspected chromosomal disorder karyotype status"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="631415712"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
